name: waterHeating_turnOn
description: This function is used to activate the boiler's hot water function.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to activate the hot water function.

parameters.name: waterHeatingTemperature
parameters.description: The temperature to set for the hot water function.

parameters.name: predefinedWaterHeatingTemperatureUnit
parameters.description: The unit of the temperature for the hot water function.
